outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
dataDirectory.comment: The path where data is downloaded to
dataCountry.comment: The preferred gas price data set to use
dataState.comment: The preferred state or province to look up gas prices for
randomCountry.comment: Indicates whether the country for gas price data should be chosen randomly
randomState.comment: Indicates whether the state or province for gas price data should be chosen randomly
blockclockEnabled.comment: Indicates whether results should be sent to a blockclock
blockclockAddress.comment: The IP address of the blockclock on your network
blockclockPassword.comment: The password for the blockclock on your network, leave blank for no password
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorTextGas.comment: The color of the main label expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextLocation.comment: The color of the location label expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextPrice.comment: The color of the price label expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
